headline: RBC Reiterates Outperform on ServiceNow (NOW) After OpenAI Partnership
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the AI Stocks on Market Radar. On January 20, RBC Capital analyst Matthew Hedberg reiterated an Outperform rating on the stock with a $195.00 price target. The rating affirmation follows news that NOW has signed a three-year deal with OpenAI to use its AI models, giving businesses access to […]

headline: Wesco Named to Fortune's Inaugural AIQ50 List
summary: Wesco International (NYSE:WCC), a leading provider of business-to-business distribution, logistics services and supply chain solutions, has been recognized by Fortune Magazine as an inaugural member of the AIQ50, a list that recognizes the top 50 Fortune 500 companies most effectively using artificial intelligence to create real business value.

headline: Is NetApp’s (NTAP) New Board Voice a Subtle Pivot in Its Customer-Led Cloud Strategy?
summary: Earlier in January 2026, NetApp added Paul Fipps, President of Global Customer Operations at ServiceNow, to its ten-member, predominantly independent board, bringing deep experience in technology-enabled growth and customer transformation. This appointment adds fresh customer-operations expertise to a board where half the directors have been appointed within the last five years, potentially influencing how NetApp aligns sales, partnerships, and digital experiences with its storage and cloud...

headline: A Look At ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation After New OpenAI Agreement On Advanced AI Models
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) just signed a multiyear agreement with OpenAI to plug frontier AI models, including speech to speech capabilities, directly into its workflow platform. The goal is to broaden real world automation across IT, operations, and customer service. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. The OpenAI agreement lands at a time when momentum in ServiceNow’s share price has cooled, with a 30 day share price return of 19.26% and a 90 day decline of 32.99%. Over the past year, the total...
